title: 19 Tennis Dresses That Go From Court to Cocktails Seamlessly
excerpt: Shop the best tennis dresses for the court and beyond. Feel like a winner with chic and comfortable options from Wilson, Tory Burch, Lacoste, and more.
text: Classic Court Style Lacoste Piqué Tennis DressProsRemovable shortsClassic lookIf Zendaya’s Challengers promo look taught us anything, it’s that Lacoste knows tennis. html:
Classic Court Style

Lacoste Piqué Tennis Dress

Pros

  • Removable shorts
  • Classic look

If Zendaya’s Challengers promo look taught us anything, it’s that Lacoste knows tennis. While your look may not be worn on a red carpet, rest assured all eyes will be on you in this classic tennis staple.

Sizes: 32-44

Colors: White/Green, Navy Blue, White/Navy Blue, Navy Blue/Bordeaux

Material: Polyester, elastane

Customer review: “Stylish comfortable tennis attire. Lacoste is staying classy.”

Softest Serve

Alo Yoga Airbrush Streamlined Dress

Pros

  • Built-in bra
  • Built-in shorts
  • Adjustable straps

When you take the ultra-soft material of Alo items you know and love and put it in dress form, you get a tennis dress you won’t want to take off.

Sizes: 2XS-L

Colors: Black, Athletic Heather Grey, White, Navy, Lilac Blue

Material: Polyester, elastane

Customer review: “The dress is pretty and unique, and the perfect length. The shorts make it comfortable for any occasion.”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

From the Barre to the Court

Popflex Active Corset Pirouette Dress

Pros

  • Extended sizing
  • Removable pads
  • Built-in shorts

The dress version of the now-viral Taylor Swift Pickleball Skirt might be even better. A corset top pairs effortlessly with the pirouette skirt, so you’ll look and feel like a ballerina on the tennis court.

Sizes: 2XS-3X

Colors: 9 options

Material: Polyester, spandex

Customer review: “Very well constructed, and the fabric is incredibly soft.”

Fun Details

Berlook Colorblocked Crop Workout Dress

Pros

  • Sweat-wicking
  • Very stretchy

This eye-catching and vibrant mini dress will have people applauding your game and your wardrobe.

Sizes: S-L

Colors: Blue, Black

Material: Nylon, spandex

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Terry Cloth

Tory Sport Terry Jacquard Tennis Dress

Pros

  • Designer
  • Removable shorts
  • Machine washable

Cons

    Tory Burch and tennis are like Carrie Bradshaw and her Manolos: meant to be together. Tory never ceases to create fashionable and fitness-oriented pieces that are—unlike your serve—hard to miss.

    Sizes: XS-XL

    Colors: Tory Navy, Snow White

    Material: Polyester

    All-Day Wear

    Abercrombie YPB Tie Game Dress

    Pros

    • Stylish enough to wear all day
    • Fabric allows you to move freely
    • Good color options

    Cons

      The only tie we’re interested in discussing is the one on this versatile piece from Abercrombie. The white piping adds a retro flair while the built-in pockets bring practicality.

      Sizes: 2XS-2XL

      Colors: 9 options

      Material: Nylon, elastane

      Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

      Timeless Black

      Wilson Sportif Tennis Dress

      Pros

      • Fully lined
      • Pockets on both legs

      Cons

        When the brand is the official tennis ball producer for the U.S. Open, you know you’re in good hands. This tennis dress that has it all, featuring a flowing skirt and shelf bra that flatters the body and elevates your style.

        Sizes: 2XS-XL

        Colors: Field Green/Sandrift, Black, Classic Navy, Midnight/Turquoise, Sunlit/Lavender

        Strappy Number

        Free People Movement One More Serve Skortsie

        Pros

        • Built-in shorts with pocket
        • Built-in bra

        Cons

        • Fit might be awkward and short according to some

        The unique strappy back on this Free People dress is what dreams are made of.

        Sizes: XS-XL

        Colors: Mediterranean Combo, Black Grape, White Combo, Sapphire Skies, Black

        Material: Polyester, elastane

        Customer review: “Super cute dress that is more flattering than all other exercise dresses I’ve tried (a lot).”

        Skirted Illusion

        Vuori Daily Tennis Dress

        Pros

        • Fully-lined
        • Moisture wicking

        Cons

          If you prefer the look of a tennis skirt but the continuity of a dress, this drawstring waistline gives the look of a tank top tucked into a skort.

          Sizes: 2XS - 2XL

          Colors: Black, Surf, White

          Material: Polyester, elastane

          Customer review: “I’ve tried many different athletic dresses and haven’t found one I love—until I found this one! It fits well, good coverage, and it’s flattering!”

          Tank Style

          Under Armour Motion Dress

          Pros

          • Built-in shorts
          • Built-in bra
          • Versatile

          Cons

          • No padding in bra
          • Might too short for some
          • Shorts bunch up

          It’s a little black dress you can wear to play tennis; what more could you want?

          Sizes: XS-2XL

          Colors: 7 options

          Material: Polyester, elastane

          Customer review: “The dress itself is rather shapeless on the rack, however it’s buttery soft and looks great when you put it on. Such a versatile little black dress, can be worn to tennis (thank you built in shorts), pair it with a cute belt bag for brunch, or a cardigan while you grocery shop!”

          Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

          Mini Moment

          Beyond Yoga Fearless Asymmetric Space Dye Active Minidress

          Pros

          • Built-in bodysuit
          • Pockets
          • Wear-tested by the brand

          Cons

            Designed to compliment all body shapes, this sporty piece also features UV protection for those extra long matches while the multiple straps add an edge that are sure to serve up an ace.

            Sizes: XS-XL

            Colors: Darkest Night, Vivid Pink Heather

            Material: Polyester, elastane

            Customer review:             “Needed an easy-to-rely-on dress for “nothing to wear” days this spring/summer—also for tennis days! The dress is demure and not too revealing, yet shows off my curves by snatching me in the right places. Forever addicted to Beyond Yoga.”

            Designer Pick

            Casablanca Tennis Dress

            Pros

            • Designer
            • Lightweight
            • Backless

            Cons

              Parisian brand Casablanca is known for its fusion of luxury and leisure, and this dress is no exception. No need for an outfit change between your day at the French Open, this dress works for it all.

              Sizes: XS-L

              Material: Cotton, polyester, elastane

              Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

              Preppy Zip-Up

              Varley Jane Court Dress

              Pros

              • Removable bra cups
              • Attached shorts

              Cons

                This dress from Varley creates the perfect modern preppy aesthetic. Whether you’re playing a doubles match or sipping on a Honey Deuce, you’re sure to make any tournament’s best-dressed list.

                Sizes: XS-XL

                Material: Polyester, elastane

                Box Pleats

                Maeve Zip-Front Box-Pleat Tennis Dress

                Pros

                • Pockets
                • Adjustable zipper front

                Everyone knows box seats are the best way to enjoy a match, so does the same go for box pleats?

                Sizes: 2XS-XL

                Material: Cotton, elastane

                Customer review: “I absolutely LOVE this outfit. Top fits great, and it’s the ideal length!”

                Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

                Pastel Lilac

                Nike Victory Dri-FIT Tennis Dress

                Pros

                • High neckline
                • Moisture-wicking technology
                • Recycled materials

                Cons

                  Get into the swing of things with this super-smooth and sporty Nike frock.

                  Sizes: XS-2XL

                  Colors: White/Black, Black/White, Lilac Ice/White, Elemental Pink/White

                  Material: Recycled polyester

                  Cool Cutouts

                  Beach Riot Astrid Dress

                  Pros

                  • Built-in bra with removable pads
                  • Built-in shorts

                  If your goal is to stand out, this one from Beach Riot is for you. The wrap skirt complements the waist cutout perfectly.

                  Sizes: XS-XL

                  Colors: Prism Pink, Crystal Coast, Black

                  Material: Polyester, spandex

                  Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

                  Crisp Pleating

                  Pink Tech Woven Pleated Tennis Dress

                  Pros

                  • Affordable
                  • Built-in shorts
                  • Adjustable straps

                  Cons

                    Tennis baller or ballerina, the pleats on this simple dress will move with you during any activity.

                    Sizes: XS-2XL

                    Colors: VS White, Blue Dancer, Pure Black

                    Material: Polyester, elastane

                    Amazon Pick

                    ATTRACO Tennis Dress with Shorts

                    Pros

                    • Removable built-in bra
                    • Shorts (with pockets) are separate

                    Cons

                    • Straps are non-adjustable

                    Balling on a budget? Look no further. No one’s going to believe you found this one on Amazon. Plus, there are 10 gorgeous colors to choose from.

                    Sizes: XS-XL

                    Colors: 10 options

                    Material: Nylon, spandex

                    Customer review: “Get to the court! I wore this to a PGA event and received many compliments. So sophisticated.”

                    Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

                    Stellar Collab

                    Sporty & Rich x Lacoste Farine Tennis Dress

                    Pros

                    • Exclusive collaboration

                    Mix a cult-followed brand with a heritage label’s archival designs, and you get a gorgeous and flattering mesh-front dress.

                    Sizes: XS-XL

                    Material: Polyamide, elastane

                    Why Trust ELLE

                    Every product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. We only recommend products that we stand behind, and the merchandise featured on our site is always driven by editorial and product testing standards, not by affiliate deals or advertising relationships. Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.
